Archaeologists in Kazakhstan have recently uncovered a pyramid-shaped mausoleum that's over 3,000 years old, making it older than some of Egypt’s pyramids | The discovery was made in the Sary-Arka region near Karaganda, and the team says it was likely built for an ancient king or clan leader.
North Korea Calls London Diplomat Who Defected 'Human Scum'. The defection of Thae Yong Ho, who was North Korea's deputy ambassador in London, was announced by the South on Wednesday.
